payments

Class PrepaidService

  • java.lang.Object
    • payments.MobileService
      • payments.PrepaidService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Billing, Operations

    public class PrepaidService
extends MobileService
implements Operations, Billing
    This class contains all calls placed by a customer, bill for call of prepaid customer.

      An attribute of type Call

      double calcBill()
      This method will calculate the bill for the call duration.
      boolean canMakeCall()
      This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
      This method returns true if balance is greater that 0
      double discountForReturningCustomer()
      This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
      As prepaid customer does not have any discounts, return 0

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrepaidService

        public PrepaidService(ConnectionAccount account,
                      double balance,
                      double data)
        An all argument constructor that initializes all the instance variables of this class.
        Parameters:
        account - of type ConnectionAccount
        balance - Attribute of type double that holds the balance of the customer.
        data - parameter of type double to pass the available data the customer in Mega Bytes (MB)

    • Method Detail

      • canMakeCall

        public boolean canMakeCall()
        This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
        This method returns true if balance is greater that 0
        Specified by:
        canMakeCall in interface Operations
        Specified by:
        canMakeCall in class MobileService
        Returns:
        balance of Type boolean

      • makeCall

        public boolean makeCall(Call call)
        This method takes a Call object as input and verifies if they can make a call using canMakeCall. If the customer can make a call, the passed Call object is assigned to the instance variable call and deduct the call bill from current balance. If the call was success return true
        Specified by:
        makeCall in interface Operations
        Specified by:
        makeCall in class MobileService
        Parameters:
        call - an argument of type Call
        Returns:
        a value of type boolean

      • discountForReturningCustomer

        public double discountForReturningCustomer()
        This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
        As prepaid customer does not have any discounts, return 0
        Specified by:
        discountForReturningCustomer in interface Billing
        Returns:
        discount of type double

      • calcBill

        public double calcBill()
        This method will calculate the bill for the call duration. For example: If an INTERNATIONAL call is placed for 65 seconds(1.083 minutes) and prepaid call tarrif for INTERNATIONAL call is $0.70 then total call cost for 1.083 minutes is $0.7583
        Specified by:
        calcBill in interface Billing
        Returns:
        bill for the current call og type double

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This overridden method returns the details of the customer. A sample output is given below.
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
        Last Call Details:
        Phone number   Call Type      From                  To
        +912689559871  INTERNATIONAL  2018-07-26 08:08:07   2018-07-26 08:12:10
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
         Available mobile data  :94.21MB
         Balance   :$69.33
         Last Call Amount   :$2.84
        -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
        Overrides:
        toString in class MobileService
        Returns:
        Details of a call as String object
